it.univpm.demoSpringBootApp.services

Class Filters

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.univpm.demoSpringBootApp.services.Filters

  • public class Filters
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that define which filter use for string and numeric values. The main difference is if the field is "migrants", then we expect another word for the year to analyze. In this case the expectation is to compare with mathematical operators (=,>,<,>=,<=) the value of the specific year for each object. Altough the filter consider string comparison between the field called and the refering attribute of the object migrant, the return is the list of objects that respect the filter.
    Author:
    Tommaso

      • select

        public static <T> java.util.Collection<T> select(java.util.Collection<T> src,
                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> fieldName,

                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> LogOp,
                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Object> yearl)
        Main method for filtering data, use of recursion to filter all the list of values.
        Parameters:
        src, - complete dataset
        fieldName, - list of reference fields
        operator, - list of reference operators
        value, - list of reference values
        LogOp, - list of link operators
        yearl, - list of reference years
        Returns:
        collection of filtered data
